item.description: Since the ladies are asking me to do this again, I am, and this time the gents are invited also. The Melting Pot is a great place to socialize while eating. While you are chatting and eating the time flies by and it isn't unusual to spend 3 hrs or more there. Also, the drinks are inexpensive compared to most places I've been to and they have an extensive wine list. So guys, come out to play, you'll love it if you like cheeses and chocolate. The manager has given me a price of $22.29 and that includes the fondues, taxes and gratuities. Bring extra money to pay for your drinks.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner at the Melting Pot
